name: BitChat Flutter Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y unzip libglu1-mesa && git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable /usr/local/flutter && echo 'export PATH="$PATH:/usr/local/flutter/bin:/opt/android-sdk/emulator:/opt/android-sdk/platform-tools"' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'no' | /opt/android-sdk/cmdline-tools/latest/bin/avdmanager create avd -n default -k 'system-images;android-34;google_apis;x86_64'
